Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Sensor fusion algorithm anomaly. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 04/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi
